title: NVIDIA Corp. stock falls Tuesday, still outperforms market
text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. 
        NVDA,
        +0.12%
       dropped 0.17% to $721.28 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around poor trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 1.37% to 4,953.17 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 1.35% to 38,272.75. The stock's fall snapped a two-day winning streak. NVIDIA Corp. closed $24.83 below its 52-week high ($746.11), which the company reached on February 12th. Trading volume (59.7 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 43.6 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. The S&P 500 is up almost 50% since October 2022.
